column5: Any thoughts on this camp? thinking of going up there this year. How is the fishing, hospitality and cabins? What are the rates. Thanks.
thanks for the info. still wonderinf if anybody has ever been there and what they thought about the place and the fishing.
My group and I went there for two years, around 15 years ago. Fishing, cabins and hospitality were all average or below, which is why we moved on. A lot can change in 15 years, though.

Ghost River Camp is featured regularly on the Midwest Outdoors television show. Usually it's the owner, Daryl fishing with Gary Roach. I doubt that I TV show would return to a camp year after year if the accomodations and fishing were poor.

Ghost River Camp is featured regularly on the Midwest Outdoors television show. Usually it's the owner, Daryl fishing with Gary Roach. I doubt that I TV show would return to a camp year after year if the accomodations and fishing were poor.

If I am not mistaken, the lodges pay Midwest Outdoors. At least that's what a northern Wisconsin guide told me a few years ago. I would think that is why they go back every year. The program, in my opinion, is an hour fishing infomercial. Nimstug Do we really need four different size rolls of toilet paper?

Going there the first week in August with my son and another dad and his 2 boys. Have heard good things about this lodge and what they offer. Search hard enough on these boards and you can find someone having something negative to say about a lodge :(
